attributes.action: Leave the EU with no deal, no date specified just as soon as possible
attributes.additional_details: Some members of parliament are telling scaring stories of how devastating no deal would be. Others are saying it would be the best thing we could do. With the extra time we have had surely we have had more time to prepare, may be shaky for a while, however we are Great Britain and could be again.
attributes.background: As the Brexit date keeps moving the petitions raised become irrelevant. Leave is leave. We urge the British Government to carry out the wishes of the majority and leave. Clean break and start a fresh.
